basics.name: Uzair Shamim
basics.summary: I am a hardworking individual capable of figuring out problems on my own when it is required of me. I also enjoy working in teams as it allows me to have my ideas critisized and improved on by others, and gives me the opportunity to do the same.

highlights: Developed React application and tested with Jest, Enzyme, Cypress and React Storybook
Developed website with AngularJS, Karma, Protractor/Selenium and Jasmine
Built a chat application using React, Java, NodeJS, WebSockets and Apache Kafka
Created RESTful Java 8 services and APIs using Spring
Built services with tiered architecture (web service, service and domain layers)
Used Dynatrace to troubleshoot performance issues in web applications
Built, deployed and released applications using Atlassian Bamboo
Developed database for tracking graduate students and faculty/curriculum resources.
Maintainer of Saka, a chrome extension for improving the browsing experience
Written using Preact, tested with Jest and the dom-testing-library
Collaborate with contributors and users to fix bugs and add features
Discuss topics like software development and testing
Document how to use libraries/programs I find interesting (eg. dom-testing-library)

courses: In a team of 3, built a podcast feed in Qt that could fetch and play episodes from a podcast on iTunes
Wrote a program that uses stenography to embed messages inside of images
Performed analysis of algorithms to determine best, worst and average case complexity
Created a website using JQuery and Perl that allows booking and cancellation of seats on a train with arbitrary amount of seats
